txt.en: 'It is good to see you again. I hope that you can spare some time to aid us.\n\n'The devilish Orcs did not heed Arvaethor's word to not return to the surface. They have once again returned to the base of the mountain. I fear an attack on Ethring may be imminent. Perhaps if we were to take the fight to their encampment, they will flee once more into the depths of the White Mountains.'
Laerind is in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Laerind.
After driving the Orcs back into the Nimrond caverns, Ringló Vale faces continued threat as the Orkish forces once again amass in the foothills of the White Mountains.

'The Orcs shall not have their revenge thanks to you. They would have amassed their forces and attacked Ethring if not for your actions. I hope they have learnt their lesson. Ringló Vale is no place for the Orcs of the White Mountain.'
Orkish forces can be found in the encampment of Gríshru.\n\nYou should defeat Orkish forces.
